title: Two plots with clear title deed next to each other 7 perch each
details: Two plots with 7 perch each bare high land available for sale 100 meters from Hunupitiya railway station road Wattala. Very close to all government and international schools, banks , super marketes and Jehovah's witnesses , 100 meters to bus stop, clear bank accepted title , Rs. 650,000/= per perch. Contact 00971505516966 or email to Sohaib@sslootah.com for details.
